meanings.definition: Relating to or composed of aerolites.
meanings.sent1: The aerolitic rock was found to be from outer space.
meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the aerolitic composition of the meteorite.
meanings.sent3: The aerolitic fragments sparkled like tiny stars in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with an aerolitic brightness, captivating everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The aerolitic nature of the stone made it a rare and valuable find.

meanings.sent1: The aerolitic debris scattered across the field after the explosion.
meanings.sent2: The aerolitic rain showered down on the town, surprising the residents.
meanings.sent3: The aerolitic arrival of the unexpected package left her puzzled but intrigued.
meanings.sent4: His rise to fame was as sudden and aerolitic as a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The aerolitic descent of the hot air balloon amazed the spectators below.
